ISSUE.TITLE: Drop support for PostgreSQL 13
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Proposed Changes Require PostgreSQL 14 or later beginning with NetBox v4.3. ### Justification Django 5.2 [no longer supports PostgreSQL 13](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/releases/5.2/#dropped-support-for-postgresql-13). Upstream support for PostgreSQL 13 ends in November 2025. ### Impact Users running PostgreSQL 13 will need to upgrade.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #18822 from netbox-community/18743-django-52 Closes #18743: Upgrade to Django 5.2

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Closes #18820: Bump minimum PostgreSQL version to 14
Closes #18820: Bump minimum PostgreSQL version to 14 (#18909)
